title: Kristen Stewart is in fighting style as she heads to karate class with girlfriend Dylan Meyer
text:
They were first seen together at the tail end of August.

Kristen Stewart and girlfriend Dylan Meyer looked like they were in full couple mode while heading to karate class in LA together on Friday.

The Charlie's Angels actress was dressed to fight, wearing a white tee shirt with low-slung Adidas joggers.

Kick it up: Kristen Stewart was ready to spar when she stepped out for karate class with her girlfriend Dylan Meyer on Friday

The Twilight actress rounded her look out with a black baseball cap, chunky chain necklace and red sneakers.

Dylan's look was retro, rocking a vintage-inspired graphic tee and jean cut-offs with a pair of burgundy slides.

She knotted her hair into a messy bun to finish the look.

Ready to sweat: The Charlie's Angels wore a white tee shirt with low-slung Adidas joggers for the workout

Throwback: Dylan's look was retro, rocking a vintage-inspired graphic tee and jean cut-offs with a pair of burgundy slides

The ladies chatted casually as they made their way to class.

Kristen fueled up with an iced coffee while Dylan went without.

Kristen and Dylan's romance came quickly after Stewart rekindled her romance with Stella Maxwell over the summer.

On-off: Stewart and ex Stella Maxwell were seen hooking up in June after an eight-month split, but things seemed to fizzle again after. The couple are seen in June 2017 above

Stewart and the 29-year-old Lions Model were seen hooking up in June after an eight-month split, but things seemed to fizzle again after.

The sapphic couple were first pictured partying together at the Met Gala way back in May 2016.

During her off-time with Stella, Stewart briefly dated stylist Sara Dinkin.
description: They looked like they were in full couple mode while heading to karate class. The Charlie's Angels actress was dressed to fight, wearing a white tee shirt with low-slung Adidas joggers.
